name: Recipe Manager
capabilities: Fetch predefined recipes from the Recipe API (recipe-api.host)
Render recipes as interactive cards with details
Search and filter recipes by keywords
Filter recipes by number of ingredients
Filter recipes by number of preparation steps
interactions: Depends on Recipe API to load recipe data
Integrates with the UI card renderer to display recipes
May interact with user preferences to highlight favorite recipes
purpose: Allows users to browse, search, and filter predefined recipes presented as cards.
notes: The search bar allows filtering dynamically as the recipe list loads. Each recipe card can optionally show images, prep time, and rating.
